title: Before You Make That Presentation
description: When you're speaking to an audience, "It's not about what you want to say. It's about what they need," says communications expert Matt Abrahams.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: When you're speaking to an audience, "It's not about what you want to say. It's about what they need," says communications expert Matt Abrahams.
